front.title: IEEE Guide for the Selection and Sizing of Batteries for Uninterruptible Power Systems

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: The characteristics of the various battery energy systems available are described so that users can select the system best suited to their requirements. This guide also describes how the rectifier and the inverter components of the uninterruptible power system (UPS) can relate to the selection of the battery system.
